title: Enable Randomised MAC address on Pixel XL, Android 10
content:
The option to 'Use randomized MAC' under Wi-Fi settings doesn't appear to be there.

I was under the impression this is a new feature of Android 10, which my Pixel XL is running.

Just looking to confirm if this setting should be there, or if it's somewhere else?

Does anyone with a Pixel XL on 10 have this option?

Documents online suggest it should be in the following place;
Open the Settings app.
Tap Network & Internet.
Tap Wi-Fi.
Tap the gear icon associated with the wireless connection to be configured.
Tap Advanced.
Tap Privacy.
Tap Use Randomized MAC

Thanks
